title: A cheeze Support gets picked at Worlds that only works well vs 1 Champ
body: And everyone is Asking for nerfs. lol

replies.body:
might be a reason riot said MF's winrate went down 5% since MF support was introduced. 


Good in lcs does not transfer over to soloq, but people never realize that.
why does it only work with zyra, i thought her teamfighting was great especially with black cleaver,

> [{quoted}](name=Kokiri Star,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KOL6nGar,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-30T09:01:11.653+0000)
>
> why does it only work with zyra, i thought her teamfighting was great especially with black cleaver,

MF is Really good at killing Plants because of Love tap Which means MF destroys her in lane
It only works with one champ as well. {{champion:22}}
